column1: Smoque BBQ////I had the pulled pork sandwich with a side of coleslaw and mac and cheese. The mac and cheese was pretty good
column3: but nothing special. The pulled pork sandwich
column5: was not very good at all. The pork did not have much taste to it and when I added more of the bbq sauce to it (which they give you on the side)
column6: it did not do much to add taste to it. I have had much better pulled pork elsewhere (Carson's).
